short_summary: To test the express publishing functionality for both tenders and awards. It will also test the funcionality of unpublishing of an active tender and subsequent reapproval by a PA.
description: Tender to test the express-publishing functionality for both tenders and awards. It will also test the functionality of the tender-unpublishing and subsequent reapproval by a PA.
